title: Perigord
description: Have you ever wanted to fly?............... Or be able to see and breathe under water?............... What about superhuman strength or speed?Well for 16-year old Jason Page this is now a reality. After inheriting a new house from a mysterious Uncle, Jason and his mother move to the beautiful and quiet town of Perigord. But even with the emergence of these fantastic powers, Jason has to contend with psychotic students, a shadowy town sheriff, unearthly mercenaries and an ancient prophecy with catastrophic repercussions.With the help of the beautiful Selene Jaeger and the enigmatic town librarian Ulysses Walker, they must prevent the use of the Gjallarhorn a mystical Norse artifact with the power to raise an unstoppable army during the townâ€™s Harvest moon Festival. Being the new kid in town was never this hard.
author: Marc Lindsay
